name: ZMT fancybox
author: zmt

sections.description:
It’s very simply WordPress plugin for „nice“ shows pictures / galleries in lightbox. This plugin implements javascript library fancybox to header and footer pages created in WordPress, functions:

  • you can configure like original fancybox (in admin menu),
  • you can use multiple galleries on page,
  • it’s designed for NextGen Gallery.
sections.installation:
1. Upload all plugins files to the /wp-content/plugins/zmt-fancybox/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq: You can put a question in the discussion on plugins webpage.
sections.changelog:
1.2

Admin configuration added

1.1

This version is fixed, tested and published.

short_description: Plugin adds fancybox code to WP header and footer. This plugin is designed for NextGen Gallery. You can use multiple galleries on page.
